name: The Unknown Pilot
description:
You need to get off this island.

At the dock a plane floats next to the pilot.

Do what you have to do to convince the pilot to fly you to safety.

- Controls -

* Use the mouse and left click to select

* Select yellow dialogue options to ask questions and make decisions

* Click on different parts of the plane to take a closer look and learn more about the pilot

* When you're ready, click on the pilot to strike up a conversation
